medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began one day prior to admission with severe epigastric pain rated as 10++/10 in intensity. There were 8 episodes of non-bilious non-bloody emesis consisting of undigested food, and on the day of admission, the patient had 5 bowel movements consisting of loose, mixed light colored/brown stools. The patient reported having similar episodes of pain and nausea over the last few years, attributed to indigestion, but was unable to seek medical help due to insurance issues.
medical_history.family_history: Mother: Diabetes type 2, myocardial infarction; Father: myocardial infarction.
